summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackSpritz on critical hydration with Dermalogica's Multi-Active Toner Spray, a refreshing blend of skin-repairing aloe, moisture-binding sodium PCA plus soothing lavender, balm mint and arnica.
details: DetailsBenefitsLight facial toner that hydrates and refreshesHelp condition the skin and prepare for proper moisture absorption when you spritz over skin after cleansing and before applying your prescribed Dermalogica moisturizerLeaves your skin feel hydrated, glowing and refreshedGood for all skin typesPro Tip: Spritz on a layer of toner and apply your serum and moisturizer on top of the toner while it is still damp for better absorptionKey IngredientsLavender Extract: a natural antiseptic, soothes and purifies the skinBalm Mint and Aloe Vera: cool and soften the skinExtracts of Arnica and Cucumber: natural skin fresheners, help condition skinMoisture-Binding Proteins: act as humectants to allow for more effective moisture absorptionItem 2152653How To UseApply after cleansing by spraying directly over the entire face and throat. Can also be sprayed onto fingertips or cotton pad and applied to the skin with light, upward strokes. Immediately follow with Dermalogica booster or moisturizer.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Arginine, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Melissa Officinalis Leaf Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Arnica Montana Flower Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Extract, Malva Sylvestris (Mallow) Flower Extract, Parietaria Officinalis Extract, Sambucus Nigra Flower Extract, Tocopherol, Phenylalanine, Histidine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Sodium PCA, Sodium Lactate, Citric Acid, Polyquaternium-4, Aspartic Acid, PCA, Ethylhexylglycerin, Methyl Gluceth-20, Polysorbate 20, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Ricinoleth-40, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Linalool, Limonene, Citral, Geraniol, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply after cleansing by spraying directly over the entire face and throat. Can also be sprayed onto fingertips or cotton pad and applied to the skin with light, upward strokes. Immediately follow with Dermalogica booster or moisturizer.
